description:
Adds BGM tracks from Gust titles that can be used to change the in-game BGM.
A set of more than 400 BGM tracks from Gust titles, featuring tracks from Atelier Ryza 2, Atelier Sophie 2, and others. 

Note: This item is planned to be released before the end of June 2023.

In-game BGM can be changed by selecting "BGM" from the diary on the desk at the atelier.
The content of the Season Pass and release dates are subject to change without notice. Please visit the official website for more information. 
This item is included in "Atelier Ryza 3 Season Pass." Please avoid making redundant purchases.
name: Gust Extra BGM Pack
